kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: &{student} = { name=Robert Downey Jr | email=ironman@marvel.com | age=27 | weight=90 | feet_tall=1.80 }

kw.name: Insert Student
kw.msg: delete from students where email = 'ironman@marvel.com'
insert into students (name, email, age, weight, feet_tall, created_at, updated_at)values('Robert Downey Jr','ironman@marvel.com',27,90,1.80,NOW(),NOW());
